selected_quotes: .@ljevanso Your new Bioscience article on Minding the Media Gap is a timely fresh synthesis! Well done! #SciComm
How can #scientists forge better partnerships with #journalists and #newmedia to ensure their voices are heard?
great read on the media/science divide shfit, nice shout out
